医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
B 细胞异常被确定为三阴性乳腺癌治疗反应的潜在生物标志物贝勒医学院及合作机构的研究人员对三阴性乳腺癌患者血液和骨髓中肿瘤诱导的 B 细胞变化有了新的认识。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/B-cell-abnormalities-identified-as-potential-biomarkers-for-triple-阴性-breast-cancer-treatment-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/B-cell-abnormalities-identified-as-potential-biomarkers-for-triple-阴性-breast-cancer-treatment-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29e22113-4b85-4e79-9738-ae635b3fabdc Thu, 12 Sep 2024 14:21:40 -0400 B cell abnormalities identified as potential biomarkers for triple negative breast cancer treatment response
早期生活方式的改变会对新陈代谢产生持久影响东芬兰大学 (UEF) 的一项新研究揭示了早期生活方式的改变如何产生长期影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Early-lifestyle-changes-lead-to- permanent-impacts-on-metabolism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Early-lifestyle-changes-lead-to- permanent-impacts-on-metabolism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8642a09-674b-4000-a198-1dd86763d15b Thu, 12 Sep 2024 14:15:24 -0400 Early lifestyle changes lead to lasting impacts on metabolism
核吞噬被认为是癌症治疗中关键的 DNA 修复机制牛津大学 (Oxford) 和新加坡南洋理工大学 (NTU Singapore) 的国际研究团队发现了一种修复受损 DNA 的新方法，该方法与接受结直肠癌治疗的患者特别相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Nucleophagy-identified-as-key-DNA-repair-mechanism-in-cancer-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Nucleophagy-identified-as-key-DNA-repair-mechanism-in-cancer-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef853ddb-3e80-4bfd-a018-4917b84f900b Thu, 12 Sep 2024 13:50:00 -0400 Nucleophagy identified as key DNA repair mechanism in cancer treatments
德克萨斯州废水样本中检测到禽流感UTHealth 休斯顿和贝勒医学院的研究人员通过病毒组测序在德克萨斯州 10 个城市的废水中检测到了今年传播到牛并感染 14 人的甲型禽流感 (H5N1) 病毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Avian-influenza-Detected-in-Texas-wastewater-samples.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Avian-influenza-Detected-in-Texas-wastewater-samples.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee754352-6dc0-463b-89b0-464c6be42a58 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 13:43:50 -0400 Avian influenza detected in Texas wastewater samples
快速管理妊娠糖尿病可降低儿童肥胖率欧洲研究协会年会上提出的一项新研究表明，在诊断出妊娠糖尿病后迅速实现血糖控制可以将婴儿在儿童时期的肥胖风险降低到与母亲没有患有妊娠糖尿病的孩子相似的水平西班牙马德里糖尿病中心 (EASD)（9 月 9 日至 13 日）发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Swift-management-of-gestational-diabetes-lowers-child-obesity-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Swift-management-of-gestational-diabetes-lowers-child-obesity-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7173cc2-eff4-4618-a540-05a7075c3927 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 13:38:45 -0400 Swift management of gestational diabetes lowers child obesity rates
新的人工智能方法从连接组数据模拟神经元活动通过神经元和人工智能方法之间的连接图，研究人员现在可以做他们从未想过的事情：预测单个神经元的活动，而无需在活体大脑中进行单一测量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-AI-method-simulates-neuronal-activity-from-connectome-data.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-AI-method-simulates-neuronal-activity-from-connectome-data.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3550f6e-14f8-47e2-b798-6d1d37a4ee53 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 13:34:46 -0400 New AI method simulates neuronal activity from connectome data
神经科学家绘制了小鼠全脑决策过程图神经科学家揭示了小鼠多个大脑区域的感觉输入如何转化为运动动作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Neuroscientists-map-brain-wide-decision-making-process-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Neuroscientists-map-brain-wide-decision-making-process-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f88bb7c-4efd-46f1-a912-1534ee21069f Thu, 12 Sep 2024 13:04:53 -0400 Neuroscientists map brain-wide decision-making process in mice
研究显示政策改变后澳大利亚羟考酮使用量下降 45% 2018 年至 2020 年间，澳大利亚实施了政策变革，以提高阿片类药物处方的质量和安全性，特别关注羟考酮。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Study-reveals-4525-drop-in-oxycodone-use-in-Australia-after-policy-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Study-reveals-4525-drop-in-oxycodone-use-in-Australia-after-policy-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=866db0ad-8c93-4a95-9851-f2c0ef0d4681 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 12:59:37 -0400 Study reveals 45% drop in oxycodone use in Australia after policy changes
新研究表明快速眼动睡眠期间脑电波可以被操纵萨里大学的一项新研究发现，在快速眼动睡眠（REM）中可以操纵脑电波，这是一个与记忆和认知相关的睡眠阶段。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-study-shows-brain-waves-can-be-manipulated-during-REM-sleep.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-study-shows-brain-waves-can-be-manipulated-during-REM-sleep.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f9c24bf-6940-4676-98d6-e3f6b69bfdc7 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 12:50:00 -0400 New study shows brain waves can be manipulated during REM sleep
概念神经元和位置细胞在记忆形成中发挥关键作用当大脑中的某些神经细胞遇到不同的图像或特定人的名字或物体的身份时，它们就会变得活跃。他们具有高度选择性，不会对其他人或物体做出反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Concept-neurons-and-location-cells-play-key-roles-in-memory-formation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Concept-neurons-and-location-cells-play-key-roles-in-memory-formation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dca619f1-66ff-4698-828c-5f1eb07f627e Thu, 12 Sep 2024 12:39:00 -0400 Concept neurons and location cells play key roles in memory formation
